net.semanticmetadata.lire
Class DocumentBuilderFactory

java.lang.Object
  net.semanticmetadata.lire.DocumentBuilderFactory

public class DocumentBuilderFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Use DocumentBuilderFactory to create a DocumentBuilder, which will create Lucene Documents from images.
This file is part of the Caliph and Emir project: http://www.SemanticMetadata.net
Date: 31.01.2006
Time: 23:00:32

Author:
Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

getDefaultDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getDefaultDocumentBuilder()
Creates a simple version of a DocumentBuilder. In this case the CEDD is used as a feature

Returns:
a simple and efficient DocumentBuilder.
See Also:
CEDD

getExtensiveDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getExtensiveDocumentBuilder()
Deprecated. Use ChainedDocumentBuilder instead

Creates a simple version of a DocumentBuilder using the MPEG/-7 visual features features all available descriptors are used.

Returns:
a fully featured DocumentBuilder.
See Also:
ColorLayout, EdgeHistogram, ScalableColor

the document builder.

getFastDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getFastDocumentBuilder()
Deprecated. use MPEG-7 feature ColorLayout or CEDD, which are both really fast.

Creates a simple version of a DocumentBuilder using the ColorLayout feature. Don't use this method any more but use the respective feature bound method instead.

Returns:
a simple and fast DocumentBuilder.
See Also:
ColorLayout

getAutoColorCorrelogramDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getAutoColorCorrelogramDocumentBuilder()
Creates a DocumentBuilder for the AutoColorCorrelation feature. Note that the extraction of this feature is especially slow! So use it only on small images! Images that do not fit in a 200x200 pixel box are resized by the document builder to ensure shorter processing time. See AutoColorCorrelogram for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created AutoCorrelation feature DocumentBuilder.

getFastAutoColorCorrelationDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getFastAutoColorCorrelationDocumentBuilder()
Deprecated. Use #getAutoColorCorrelogramDocumentBuilder instead.

Creates a DocumentBuilder for the AutoColorCorrelation feature. Note that the extraction of this feature is especially slow, but this is a more fast, but less accurate settings version! Images that do not fit in a defined bounding box they are resized by the document builder to ensure shorter processing time. See AutoColorCorrelogram for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created AutoCorrelation feature DocumentBuilder.

getCEDDDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getCEDDDocumentBuilder()
Creates a DocumentBuilder for the CEDD feature. See CEDD for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created CEDD feature DocumentBuilder.

getFCTHDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getFCTHDocumentBuilder()
Creates a DocumentBuilder for the FCTH feature. See FCTH for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created FCTH feature DocumentBuilder.

getJCDDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getJCDDocumentBuilder()
Creates a DocumentBuilder for the JCD feature. See JCD for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created DocumentBuilder

getJpegCoefficientHistogramDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getJpegCoefficientHistogramDocumentBuilder()
Creates a DocumentBuilder for the JpegCoefficientHistogram feature. See JpegCoefficientHistogram for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created DocumentBuilder

getColorHistogramDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getColorHistogramDocumentBuilder()
Creates a DocumentBuilder for simple RGB color histograms. See SimpleColorHistogram for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created feature DocumentBuilder.

getTamuraDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getTamuraDocumentBuilder()
Creates a DocumentBuilder for three Tamura features. See Tamura for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created Tamura feature DocumentBuilder.

getGaborDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getGaborDocumentBuilder()
Creates a DocumentBuilder for the Gabor feature. See Gabor for more information on the image feature. Be sure to use the same options for the ImageSearcher as you used for the DocumentBuilder.

Returns:
the created Tamura feature DocumentBuilder.

getFullDocumentBuilder

public static DocumentBuilder getFullDocumentBuilder()
Creates and returns a DocumentBuilder, which contains all available features. For AutoColorCorrelogram the getAutoColorCorrelogramDocumentBuilder() is used. Therefore it is compatible with the respective Searcher.

Returns:
a combination of all available features.
